segments.text: Hide me , Yi-jun ! The kids all think I'm the real Easter bunny !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Aw , that's sweet ! I knew your costume would be a success .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's a success all right . The kids keep trying to catch me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , I saw that . I thought you were playing a game with them .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Some game ! You try being tackled by ten kids at once !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Um , Holly ? Look behind you . They're coming this way .
segments.speaker: S2
